Class LensFlare

  • java.lang.Object
    • rajawali.extras.LensFlare

  • public class LensFlare
extends java.lang.Object
    LensFlare effects class for adding lens flare to the renderer.
    Author:
    Andrew Jo

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(Vector3 position)
        Sets the world space coordinates of the lens flare. Make sure this is the same position as the light position for which to apply the lens flare effect.
        Parameters:
        position -
